title: Reducing ban times or reseting bans
body: so i started downloading lol on my new computer but it was missing the d3dx9_39.dll thing and i started a game but it didn't let me play because i was missing the thing now i have to wait for 20minutes waiting for not afk. plz riot fix

replies.body:
To hopefully prevent this crash from happening again, please try the solutions in the [**Bug Splat and Game Crashes**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974-Bug-Splat-and-Game-Crashes) Riot Games Support article. This should hopefully be fixed by reinstalling/updating your DirectX!

For future reference, [**Help & Support**](http://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/f/ElA0rvVL) would be the optimal place to ask for technical help!

Don't make the thread sound like you're just whining about the ban times and restrictions. Title it something like "d3dx9 file missing", for example, so Riot know it's something to read that's worth their time. 

Just saying...
